item.title: [508] Commands
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

Oh yeah! Can’t belive I didn’t spot at least the [0] missing… As for the Thieving, well that’s just typical of me to put a capital T by mistake… Lol. Anyways, thanks man

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Commands
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

The problem with the shops command is that you are checking if the entire cmd array equals shops rather than just the first word. Change it to cmd[0].

The problem with Thiefland is that it is case sensitive and requires a capital t at the beginning of the command.
Change equals to equalsIgnoreCase.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Commands
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

I’ll post the first one I added before they stopped working completely.

This one is the last one I made that works:

				} else if(cmd[0].equals("slayer")) {
				p.teleportTo(3431, 3536, 0, 4, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0);
				p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You have teleported to the Slayer tower.");
				p.frames.sendMessage(p, "climb the stairs for level one (middle floor");
				p.frames.sendMessage(p, "climb the chain for level three (top floor)");
				p.frames.sendMessage(p, "Climb down anything for level zero (ground floor)");

Then I realized they wern’t working when I added this one:

			} else if(cmd.equals("shops")) {
			p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You teleport to the shopping area!");
			p.teleportTo(3164, 3467, 0, 4, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0);

Then I added this one (I’m adding thieving to my [508] ;))

			} else if (cmd[0].equals("Thieving")) {
			p.requestAnim(4965, 1);
			p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You use your thieving skill to break into Camelot Castle.");
                      	p.teleportTo(2744, 3483, 0, 0, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0);

EDIT: I added ::moneys and that works, but ::shops and ::thieving don’t work…

Read full topic

If you know why please tell me so I can put it right.
